title: Should I get the iPhone 11 or wait for 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not sure what one has to do with the other. If you want an iPhone 11, then you should get one. There is no need to delay your purchase. If you want to wait for 2020, then we’re 5 months in so we’re long past that. I say get the iPhone you want regardless of what year it is.

I believe you mean 2021 it’s rumoured that a new i phone 12 will be announced at the apple virtual conference June 22 2020 it is supposed to be more advanced than I phone 11 so if you can put of buying a little while longer it might be worth the wait
